<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/apps"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to create a set of credentials in your Port organization, containing a `client ID` and `client secret`.<br/>

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
